events.name: Social Coding
events.description: A space for women coders to learn from each other, to practice and discuss learnings with fellow peers. This would be a weekly event of informal space to do coding. So bring your pet projects along or join one of our existing teams/ projects to work on. Featured Projects:https://trello.com/b/kl2BTwil/wwc-sg-social-coding-projects First timers, please read:Newbies Step-by-step Guide Please bring your own laptop. Agenda:6:30p - Registration and Introduce projects7:00p - Break out into groups and Start coding! ^_^8:30p - End session There is no food provided, so please make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, we recommend to bring your own water bottle along. Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre

events.name: Dockerizing your app
events.description:
Docker is the world’s leading software container platform. Developers use Docker to eliminate “works on my machine” problems when collaborating on code with co-workers. Operators use Docker to run and manage apps side-by-side in isolated containers to get better compute density The workshop in this session will focus specifically on dockerizing node.js / flask web apps 

AGENDA

Introduction to Docker
Explore docker hub
Docker 101 Workshop
Dockerize a sample node.js app
Deploy a dockerized app


MEET THE PEOPLE



Prasanna Veerapandi
Assistant Lecturer - Institute of Systems Science, NUS
Speaker


REQUIREMENTS


Participants to bring own laptop

RESERVING A SEAT

Enter the promotional code that accompanies the invitation email sent to you to reserve a seat. Limited seats available. Hurry!
events.location: StackUp Studio, 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore 139955

events.name: July Meetup
events.description:
Hi friends! We're thrilled to have another ReactJS Singapore meetup in July.  



Agenda  7.00pm: Doors open - mingle over food and drinks 7.20pm: Start of session, opening address by hosts 7.30pm: Start of scheduled talks 9:00pm: Community announcements / End of event  Scheduled Talks • 'Redux Sagas: Practical Introduction' by Kawi Xiao • 'Data-driven development with Flow and GraphQL' by KJ  Information for Attendees Remember to bring a photo ID to get through building security! The meetup will be held at Spacemob Ascent, 2 Science Park Drive #02-05/06, Singapore 118222. If you're traveling by MRT, the closest MRT station is CC24 Kent Ridge. Food and drinks will not be provided for this event.  Job Opportunities  - Regit is hiring a Head of Mobile Technology Have a job position you'd like to announce? Contact us and we'll post it here.  Venue Sponsor
events.location: Spacemob Ascent, 2 Science Park Drive #02-05, Singapore 118222
